articles.author: Paul Mozur
articles.title: China Sentences Wang Yi, Christian Pastor, to 9 Years in Prison
articles.description: The founder of one of China’s largest unregistered churches was given a lengthy sentence for what the government called subversion of state power.
articles.content: Mr. Wang had become known for taking high-profile positions on politically sensitive issues, including forced abortions and the massacre that crushed the Tiananmen Square democracy movement in 1989. More recently, he emerged as a critic of Xi Jinping, China's… [+1387 chars]

articles.author: Sui-lee Wee
articles.title: Chinese Scientist Who Genetically Edited Babies Gets 3 Years in Prison
articles.description: He Jiankui’s work was also carried out on a third infant, according to China’s state media, in a new disclosure that is likely to add to the global uproar over such experiments.
articles.content: BEIJING A court in China on Monday sentenced He Jiankui, the researcher who shocked the global scientific community when he claimed that he had created the worlds first genetically edited babies, to three years in prison for carrying out illegal medical pract… [+1127 chars]

articles.author: Benjamin Hoffman
articles.title: What We Learned in N.F.L. Week 17
articles.description: The 49ers hung on for a wild win in Seattle, the Packers and the Chiefs both secured first-round byes, and the Patriots were shocked by Miami.
articles.content: The play clock is important. It looked like a Hollywood ending in Seattle. Marshawn Lynch, in his first week back from retirement, ran onto the field in the waning moments of a crucial game against the 49ers hoping to punch the ball in for game-winning touchd… [+1683 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Sex Toy an Electronics Show Award Finalist After Controversy
articles.description: A sex toy that can be controlled through a mobile app is a finalist for the Last Gadget Standing award at CES 2020, an electronics show in Las Vegas.
articles.content:
An independent panel of judges had selected Lora DiCarlos Ose vibrator last fall for a CES 2019 Innovation Honoree Award in the robotics and drone category.
But the Consumer Technology Association disqualified the gadget, telling the company it reserved the … [+315 chars]

articles.author: Dionne Searcey and Laura Boushnak
articles.title: Left Behind by Migrant Husbands, Women Break the Rules and Go to Work
articles.description: Wives are shocking their traditional West African villages by earning money and running large households while their husbands are in Europe seeking jobs.
articles.content:
KOUTIA, Senegal Years had passed since her husband had crossed the sea to look for work in Europe. Left behind, Khadijah Diagouraga trudged to the couples peanut fields alone every day, struggling to earn enough to provide for an extended family of 13.
When … [+809 chars]
